description: Try our easy to follow Tropical Cocktail recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Tropical Cocktail Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Strain through a fine sieve and discard solids. Chill. Combine sugar syrup, 3 cups coconut water, 2 cups pineapple juice, juice of 2 limes, 1/2 cup Malibu, 2 kaffir lime leaves and pineapple wedges (reserving some for garnish) in a large bowl and stir until combined. Pour into tall jugs with 4 cups ice. Add 750ml soda water and stir until combined. Fill glasses with cocktail, garnish with a pineapple wedge on the side and serve immediately.
